Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Created Job in Jenkins to run orderer(solo) + peer tests but CLI commands has to run in CLI container. Unable to run CLI commands in CLI containers.. Working on this.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Created Jenkins job for orderer (solo) and running this job as cron job for every 6 hours.. CLI tests are now stable, Next week will integrate kafka based tests in CLI..

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: This has been integrated in CI
